name: Dodge! (Showerthoughts Studios)
description:
DODGE! V0.1 [BETA]

DODGE is our first attempt at a game playable game within the genre of an endless runner. We've had very little unity experience, but over the course of this project have picked up a tremendous amount of knowledge around the field, and we are forever expanding that knowledge. Game is currently available on windows.

The game is free! If you wanna put some money into the game to help us progress by being able to source more assets then that's really appreciated. If you don't, that's also 100% fine. 

We really hope you enjoy, any advice you have, PLEASE let us know so we can try and add them into the game for you.
